channel.title: I have a question that I'd like many people to answer
channel.description:
which kind of server t oyou prefer to play: Server type #1 1.items dont require levels to use or equip 2.magic doesnt need runes and levels to use 3.spawning commands for just about everything 4.levels dont matter for all the other levels
Server type #2 1.items require levels to use them 2.magic requires runes and levels to use 3.theres only a basic spawning command to get you started and you have to work for your iems 4.you have to train levels to do things like smith rune, etc
Add Ons 1. drop items when you die 2.dont drop items when you die
thanks and feel free to add stuff on

item.title: I have a question that I'd like many people to answer
item.dc:creator: @Darkfrost Darkfrost
item.description:
@Darkfrost wrote:

#2, With #1 People will play for 5-30mins then go away…

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question that I'd like many people to answer
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

which kind of server t oyou prefer to play:
Server type #1
1.items dont require levels to use or equip
2.magic doesnt need runes and levels to use
3.spawning commands for just about everything
4.levels dont matter for all the other levels

Server type #2
1.items require levels to use them
2.magic requires runes and levels to use
3.theres only a basic spawning command to get you started and you have to work for your iems
4.you have to train levels to do things like smith rune, etc

Add Ons

  1. drop items when you die
    2.dont drop items when you die

thanks and feel free to add stuff on
